#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
 
const int mod = (int)1e9 + 7;
 
vector<int> v;
 
vector<int> mul(vector<int> const &a, vector<int> const &b) {
	vector<int> r(401,0);
	for (int i = 0; i < 401; i++) {
		for (int j = 0; j < 401; j++) {
			if (i + j > 400) break;
			r[i + j] += 1LL * a[i] * b[j] % mod;
			if (r[i + j] >= mod) r[i + j] -= mod;
		}
	}
	return r;
}
 
vector<int> add(vector<int> const &a, vector<int> const &b) {
	vector<int> r(401,0);
	for (int i = 0; i < 401; i++) {
		r[i] = a[i] + b[i];
		if (r[i] >= mod) r[i] -= mod;
	}
	return r;
}
 
vector<int> pow2(long long k) {
	if (k == 1) return v;
	if (k % 2 == 0) {
		vector<int> r = pow2(k / 2);
		return mul(r,r);
	} else {
		return mul(pow2(k - 1),v);
	}
}
 
vector<int> sum(long long k) {
	if (k == 1) return v;
	if (k % 2 == 0) {
		vector<int> mu = sum(k / 2);
		return add(mul(pow2(k / 2),mu),mu);
	} else {
		return add(sum(k - 1),pow2(k));
	}
}
 
int main() {
 
	//freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
	//freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
 
	int n; long long k; cin >> n >> k;
 
	v.resize(401,0);
 
	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		int x; cin >> x;
		v[x]++;
	}
 
	v = sum(k);
 
	int q; cin >> q;
 
	while(q--) {
		int x; cin >> x;
		cout << v[x] << endl;
	}
 
	return 0;
}
